feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-26T03:59:34.705871Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;第一个室温环境压力超导体？</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.12008</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T16 :58:10.281933Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.12008"/>; <作者>; <name>;Akronymus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Akronymus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4 /images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;我们成功合成了具有改性铅磷灰石结构的室温超导体LK-99。 LK-99的超导性是由于Cu$^{2+}$取代Pb$^{2+}$(2)离子引起的轻微体积收缩，从而在界面中产生超导量子阱。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-first-room-Temperature-ambient-Pressure-superconductor" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36864624" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;强激光驱动微管内爆产生 MT 磁场</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2009.00828</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T01:58:10.470195Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2009.00828"/>; <author >; <name>;ctoth</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ctoth</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;由超强激光脉冲驱动的微管内爆用于产生超高磁场。由于激光产生能量为兆电子伏的热电子，内壁表面的冷离子向中心轴内爆。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# Generation-of-mt-Magnetic-fields-by-intense-laser-driven-microtube-implosions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36872139" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PRQL：管道式关系查询语言</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/PRQL/prql</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T18:58:10.471160Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/PRQL/prql"/>; <author>; <name>;animal_spirits</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=animal_spirits</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c4ec6198e5445cfa52d83958a5d1be5fbd83409a2cdebb3bb7d1ad180cd053a2/68747470733a2 f2f636f6e747269622e726f636b732f696d6167653f7265706f3d5052514c2f7072716c" style="宽度：220px；高度：92px；" />;<br />;PRQL 是一种用于转换数据的现代语言 — 一种简单、强大、流水线的 SQL 替代品。它形成了转换的逻辑管道，支持变量和函数等抽象，并且可以与任何使用 SQL 的数据库一起使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#prql-pipelined-relational-query-language" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36866861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;本地运行 Llama 2 指南</stitle>; <id>;https://replicate.com/blog/run-llama-locally</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:58:10.472241Z</updated>; <link href="https://replicate.com/blog/run-llama-locally"/>; <author>; <name>;bfirsh</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=bfirsh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://replicate.com/static/blog/run-llama-locally/llama-captain.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;您可以在 M1/M2 Mac、Windows、Linux 甚至手机上本地运行 Llama 2，无需连接互联网。您可以使用三种开源工具在自己的设备上运行 Llama 2：Llama.cpp、Ollama 和 MLC LLM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#guide-to-running-llama-2-locally" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36865495" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;树形图非常棒</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.phronemophobic.com/treemaps-are-awesome.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T20:58:10.473280Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.phronemophobic.com/treemaps-are-awesome.html"/>; <author>; <name>;capableweb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=capableweb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.phronemophobic.com/treemaps-are-awesome/images/sizes-example.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;树形图是一种未得到充分利用的可视化效果，它能够一般性地汇总多种形状和大小的数据。它们可以成为探索和导航混乱数据块的灵活工具。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#treemaps-are-awesome" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36868940" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;蓝鳍金枪鱼的壮丽</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newyorker.com/science/elements/the-magnificence-of-the-bluefin-tuna</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T00:58:10.474616Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/science/elements/the-magnificence-of-the-bluefin -tuna"/>; <author>; <name>;Petiver</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Petiver</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/photos/64b7ff4f69af7f86491410d6/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/Galchen_Tuna.png" 样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：126像素；” />;<br />;在赫尔曼·梅尔维尔的《白鲸》的第 45 章中，以实玛利讲述了鲸鱼被鱼叉刺中、逃脱，然后再次遭遇的实例。重遇鲸鱼的想法似乎很荒诞，但它突显了海洋及其生物的有限性。 Karen Pinchin 的文章《他们自己的海洋之王：金枪鱼、痴迷和我们海洋的未来》讲述了蓝鳍金枪鱼和人类追捕者的故事，重点介绍了金枪鱼渔民阿尔·安德森 (Al Anderson) 和被捕获了 3 次的金枪鱼阿米莉亚 (Amelia)。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-magnificence-of-the-bluefin-tuna" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36851107" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;远远领先于时代：纽约远程休息室</stitle>; <id>;https://docpop.org/2013/10/way-ahead-of-its-time-the-remote-lounge-nyc/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:58:10.475875Z</updated>; <link href="https://docpop.org/2013/10 /way-ahead-of-its-time-the-remote-lounge-nyc/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Ivoah</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Ivoah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://docpop.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/console_images-e138134066149 9.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;The Remote Lounge 是 2001 年 10 月至 2007 年 11 月期间位于纽约包厘街的一家高科技酒吧。酒吧的噱头是里面挤满了监视器和闭路电视摄像机。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#way-ahead-of-its-time-the-remote-lounge-nyc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36857069" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mark Watson 的所有 Lisp 书籍</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/mark-watson/free-older-books-and-software/tree/main/opencontent</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T00:58:10.477117Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/mark-watson/free-older-book s-and-software/tree/main/opencontent"/>; <author>; <name>;KRAKRISMOTT</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KRAKRISMOTT</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Mark Watson 的 Lisp 书籍可供免费下载。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-of-mark-watson-s-lisp-books" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36844673" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;互联网自由区（1997）</stitle>; <id>;https://arachnoid.com/freezone/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T22:58:10.478396Z</updated>; <link href="https://arachnoid.com/freezone/"/>; <author>; <name>;davikr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=davikr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;互联网已被商业利益所占领，导致免费内容减少，质量下降。本网站致力于原始互联网，重视信息、程序和内容的自由交换。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-internet-free-zone-1997" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36860488" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;命令行谋杀之谜（2014）</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/veltman/clmystery</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T20:58:10.479512Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/veltman/clmystery"/>; <author>; <name>;smartmic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=smartmic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/d9a3e38b5d48f2723d33ef91448d98ed2ce2b431b3a6426b11dd2799d132ecb8/veltman/clmystery" style="width: 220px; height: 11 0像素；” />;<br />;打开终端，转到文件所在位置，然后首先阅读文件“说明”。要开始了解如何使用命令行，请打开 cheatsheet.md 或 cheatsheet.pdf。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-command-line-murder-mystery-2014" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36868978" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Octox：受 xv6-riscv 启发的类 Unix 操作系统 Rust</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/o8vm/octox</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:58:10.480730Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/o8vm/octox"/>; <author>; <name>;o8vm</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=o8vm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1aa9584e6c812c231ad6aeb525954b1afff7ac723b40f65f096566a634e00a1f/68747470733 a2f2f7668732e636861726d2e73682f7668732d364d51424979416f33447042724152427848784c33352e676966" style="宽度：220px；高度：144px；" />;<br />;octox 是一个用纯 Rust 实现的类 Unix 操作系统，受到 xv6-riscv 的启发。它遵循 xv6 的结构和风格，包括一个简单的 shell 和一个名为 ulib 的用户库。该系统允许用户开发自己的命令并添加新的系统调用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#octox-unix-like-os-in-rust-inspired-by-xv6-riscv" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36865682" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;18 世纪的电子邮件：光学电报 (2007)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lowtechmagazine.com/2007/12/email-in-the-18.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T23:58:10.481959Z</updated>; <link href="https ://www.lowtechmagazine.com/2007/12/email-in-the-18.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;eatonphil</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eatonphil</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.lowtechmagazine.com/images/2007/12/23/copy_optical_telegraph_tower _4.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：313px；" />;<br />;200多年前，光电报可以实现高速无线远距离通信，无需电力。它由一个塔网络组成，电报员使用望远镜逐个符号传输编码信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#email-in-the-18th- century-the-optical-telegraph-2007" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36861004" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在投诉 SPARC4 运行缓慢后被叫到教授办公室</stitle>; <id>;https://infosec.exchange/@paco/110772422266480371</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T03:58:10.483437Z</updated>; <link href="https://infosec.ex change/@paco/110772422266480371"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;一位教授抱怨他的 Sparc4 计算机运行缓慢。当 IT 支持人员进行调查时，他们发现速度缓慢是由教授的窗户下藏着蟑螂的恶作剧造成的，蟑螂逐渐繁殖并消耗 RAM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#got- Called-to-a-professors-office-after-a-complaint-his-sparc4-was-running-slow" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36857314" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ent ry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Digikey 物理连接器教程</stitle>; <id>;https://www.digikey.com/en/articles/connector-tutorial</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T20:58:10.485856Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.digikey.com/en/article s/connector-tutorial"/>; <作者>; <name>;dragontamer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dragontamer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.digikey.com/-/media/Images/Article%20Library/TechZone%20Articles/2017/September/Connector%20Tutorial/article-20 17september-connector-tutorial-fig1.jpg?ts=42192405-2a3e-4a3c-811b-9ef2498d1852&h=216&w=600&la=en-US" style="宽度：220px；高度：80px；" />;<br />;连接器是电路的重要组成部分，因为它们提供了快速有效的方法来连接电路的不同部分。它们有助于减少制造时间，并根据具体应用进行选择。矩形连接器（例如 XHP-2）常用于 PCB 板上，具有用于连接电线的公头和母头插座。不同系列的连接器可使用不同的触点，包括线规和电镀选项。还提供预压接引线和工具，以便更轻松地进行原型设计和生产。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#digikey-s-physical-connectors-tutorial" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36858076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：圆桌会议 (YC S23) – 使用 AI 模拟调查</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36865625</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:58:10.487050Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=368 65625"/>; <author>; <name>;timshell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=timshell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Roundtable 使用 LLM 来模拟调查，提供廉价且快速的结果。通过对精心策划的调查数据集进行法学硕士培训，他们可以构建人类行为和观点的通用模型。这些模拟已经过实证验证并显示出有希望的结果。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-roundtable-yc-s23-using-ai-to-simulate-surveys" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36865625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FTC 准备提起诉讼，可能会导致亚马逊破产</stitle>; <id>;https://www.politico.com/news/2023/07/25/ftc-lawsuit-break-up-amazon-00108130</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T01:58:10.488169Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.politico.com/news/2023/07/25/ftc-lawsuit-break-up-amazon-00108130"/>; <author>; <name>;jnord</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jnord</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.politico.com/dims4/default/2aaa 453/2147483647/strip/true/crop/4500x2999+0+0/resize/630x420!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.politico.com%2F06%2Fd2%2F3af167124002867633be24d8dec1%2Fprime-day-scams- 60936.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;联邦贸易委员会正在准备对亚马逊提起诉讼，这可能会导致该公司分拆。投诉可能集中在亚马逊 Prime、亚马逊阻止竞争网站降低价格的规则，以及迫使商家使用亚马逊物流和广告服务的政策。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ftc-readies-lawsuit-that-c​​ould-break-up-amazon" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36871821" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;消息层安全 (MLS) 协议</stitle>; <id>;https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc9420</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T15:58:10.490508Z</updated>; <link href="https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc9420"/>; <作者>; <name>;pieter_mj</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pieter_mj</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.ietf.org/lib/dt/11.5.0/ietf/images/ietf-logo.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;消息传递应用程序越来越多地利用端到端安全机制来确保消息只能由通信端点访问，而不能由参与传递消息的任何服务器访问。在本文档中，指定了一种密钥建立协议，该协议为规模从两个到数千个的组提供高效的异步组密钥建立，并具有前向保密（FS）和妥协后安全性（PCS）。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-messaging-layer-security-mls-protocol" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36863915" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;OpenAI 由于准确性不佳而关闭其 AI 分类器</stitle>; <id>;https://decrypt.co/149826/openai-quietly-shutters-its-ai-detection-tool</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T14:58:10.491753Z</updated>; <link href="https://decrypt.co/149826/openai-quiet ly-shutters-its-ai-detection-tool"/>; <作者>; <name>;cbowal</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cbowal</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://img.decrypt.co/insecure/rs:fit:1536:0:0:0/plain/https://cdn.decrypt.co/wp-content/uploads/202 3/07/jaldps_a_dumb_idiot_sad_robot_with_a_pointy_clown_hat_grounded__a0629591-8739-4bc3-ae48-e6049d0e67ae-gID_7.png@webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;OpenAI 由于准确性不佳而退役了其人工智能内容检测器，这让文科教授和教师的希望落空。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openai-shuts-down-its-ai-classifier-due-to-poor-accuracy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36862850" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google 放弃将 Assistant 智能音箱迁移至紫红色的工作</stitle>; <id>;https://9to5google.com/2023/07/25/google-abandons-assistant-speakers-fuchsia/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T00:58:10.492902Z</updated>; <link href="https://9to 5google.com/2023/07/25/google-abandons-assistant-speakers-fuchsia/"/>; <作者>; <name>;thecosmicfrog</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thecosmicfrog</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://9to5google.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/1 0/google_nest_audio_sand_2.jpg?quality=82&strip=all&w=1600" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：111 像素；" />;<br />;在这项工作首次被发现后不到一年，谷歌就放弃了将其 Assistant 智能音箱系列升级到 Fuchsia 操作系统的计划。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-abandons-work-to-move-assistant-smart-speakers-to-fuchsia" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36871673" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ONNX 运行时：跨平台加速机器学习</stitle>; <id>;https://onnxruntime.ai/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T15:58:10.493917Z</updated>; <link href="https://onnxruntime.ai/"/>; <author>; <name>;valgaze</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=valgaze</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://onnxruntime.ai/images/logos/adobe-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#onnx-runtime-cross-platform-accelerated-machine-learning" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36863522" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mathematica 期刊不再接受提交</stitle>; <id>;https://www.mathematica-journal.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T21:58:10.495106Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.mathematica-journal.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;RafelMri</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RafelMri</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://content.wolfram.com/uploads/sites/19/2023/06/Vol-23-thumb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 284px;" />;<br />;虽然 The Mathematica Journal 不再接受投稿，但 Wolfram 社区每天都会发表类似深度的文章，包括来自多元化且知识渊博的受众的参与。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mathematica-journal-is-no-longer-accepting-submissions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36869486" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Codex Gigas：中世纪最大的手稿</stitle>; <id>;https://historyofinformation.com/detail.php?entryid=2359</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T16:58:10.496059Z</updated>; <link href="https://historyofinformation.com/detail.php?entryid=2359 "/>; <author>; <name>;RickyS</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RickyS</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://historyofinformation.com/images/mapcache/5f14fd49f640b5f7eb5510f298d5167b.png" style="width: 220px; height: 80px ;” />;<br />;《巨抄本》，也称为魔鬼圣经，是现存最大的中世纪手稿。它创建于 13 世纪初，包含整个拉丁文通俗版圣经以及其他文本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#codex-gigas-the-largest-manuscript-of-the-middle-ages" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36844579" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Invoice Dragon – 用于创建 PDF 发票的开源应用程序</stitle>; <id>;https://invoicedragon.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T11:58:10.499537Z</updated>; <link href="https://invoicedragon.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;lanijuyi</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lanijuyi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;使用 Invoice Dragon 轻松创建专业发票和收据，并以 PDF 格式下载，以便于共享和记录保存。而且这一切都是免费的！ <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-invoice-dragon-an-open-source-app-to-create-pdf-invoices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36860898" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;情感：一本代码书</stitle>; <id>;https://tidyfirst.substack.com/p/emotions-a-code-book</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T17:58:10.500611Z</updated>; <link href="https://tidyfirst.substack.com/p/emotions-a-code-book" />; <author>; <name>;KentBeck</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KentBeck</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws .com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fed0ff581-9ea9-478c-b527-09cb5158e528_500x500.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了作者理解和解码情感的个人历程。它强调了情感作为包含重要信息的信封的重要性，并提供了用于解释不同情感信息的备忘单或密码书。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#emotions-a-code-book" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36849147" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;显示 HN：Marsha – 基于 LLM 的编程语言</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/alantech/marsha</id>; <updated>;2023-07-25T15:58:10.502423Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/alantech/marsha"/>; <author>; <name>;ISV​​_Damocles</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=ISV_Damocles</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alantech/marsha/main/examples/images/duckduckgo-terminal.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 189px;" />;<br />;Marsha 是一种基于 LLM 的编程语言，它允许您使用简单的语法描述您想要完成的操作，并提供使用示例。 Marsha 编译器指导法学硕士生成经过测试的 Python 软件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-marsha-an-llm-based-programming-language" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36864021" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
